docs.text: this is the kind of movie that makes one appreciate disney's live- action george of the jungle .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: tarzan and the lost city , the latest attempt to bring edgar rice burrough's legendary hero to the big screen , is one of the most inept and ill-timed of any tarzan adventure so far .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: badly conceived and poorly executed , tarzan and the lost city appears headed for a quick trip to video store shelves .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i have no idea why the producers chose now to bring back tarzan ; it's not as if there are legions of new fans clamoring for his next movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: furthermore , it's even more curious that this film is rated pg , which , by definition , rules out any sex or explicit violence .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and , while i'm not advocating the excesses embraced by the 1981 bo derek version of the story , tarzan deserves a slightly more adult approach than the one used in the embarrassing production .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , no tweaking of the content to change the rating could have saved tarzan and the lost city , since the film's troubles originated with the script and were propagated all the way down the line .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: imagine george of the jungle stripped of all ( intentional ) humor , and you have a fair idea of what this tarzan is like .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with its uninspired action and tepid adventure sequences , the film barely registers a pulse .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: anyone in search of a relatively entertaining , family jungle adventure should check out the 1994 version of the jungle book , which uses the same basic elements to much better effect .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the only worthwhile element of tarzan and the lost city is the pretty scenery ( which , unfortunately , includes the two lead actors ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film doesn't attempt to re-tell the origin story ? the thinking is that it has been done often enough .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: instead , tarzan and the lost city introduces us to lord graystoke a . k . a . john clayton a . k . a . tarzan the ape man ( casper van dien ) several days before his marriage to lady jane porter ( jane march ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he is living happily in england , enjoying the benefits of being a land-owning noble .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: meanwhile , in central africa , the dastardly nigel ravens ( steven waddington ) , a self-proclaimed scholar and explorer , believes he has found the way to the lost city of opar , which he calls the cradle of civilization .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on the way there , he and his band of mercenaries do all sorts of nasty things , like burning native villages , to earn the wrath of the locals .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: one shaman , determined to stop ravens from unearthing opal , sends a mystical message to tarzan for help .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with lady jane following close behind , he returns to the jungle where he was born .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: its patently obvious that casper van dien ( one of the pretty-boy heroes of starship troopers ) was not hired on the basis of his acting ability .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with his plastic facial expressions , monotone voice , and complete inability to make convincing animal noises , his range rivals that of steven seagal .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his pecs , however , are impressive , and director carl schenkel makes sure that he is given every opportunity to show them off .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: jane march , on the other hand , has to keep her shirt on , which may be a first for her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: some six years ago , march give a solid performance in jean jacques annaud's steamy the lover .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: since then , she made the career-killing decision of appearing opposite bruce willis in the color of night , which exploited her every acting defiency .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: tarzan continues this trend .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: march may be attractive , but , at least judging by this performance , she can't act .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: meanwhile , steven waddington has serious trouble summoning up the menace necessary to be a really detestable bad guy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: instead , he turns out to be little more than a nuisance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story line is pure formula , which has largely been true throughout the years for almost all of the tarzan movies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the problem is that this one seems so childish and lifeless .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the romantic elements are all contrived ? in fact , lady jane's presence is necessary only so she can be captured and subsequently rescued by her buff fiance .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the special effects are truly bottom-of-the-barrel ( including some laughably bad men in ape costumes ? apparently , animatronics were too expensive for this production ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and , of course , as with all jungle movies , there are the obligatory cute animals .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: over the years , the legend of tarzan has been one of the most popular sources for film series material .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the most famous ape man was johnny weismuller , but no less than two dozen other actors have essayed the part ( including gordon scott , who is widely believed to be the best actor to tackle the role ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: weismuller made 12 tarzan features ; van dien will probably fall 11 short of that number .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and , having seen tarzan and the lost city , i would argue that the movie-going public would have been well served if he had missed by 12 .
docs.label: negative
